DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe , North South America . The aim trial investigate dietary intervention effect weight initiate insulin treatment subject type 2 diabetes currently treat oral antidiabetic drug ( OADs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Dietary Intervention Weight Change Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes ( diagnose clinically ) least 6 month prior trial start Insulin naive subject HbA1c : 7.09.0 % ( inclusive ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : 25.045.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Use Thiazolidinedione ( TZDs ) Glucagonlike peptide1 analogue ( GLP 1 ) receptor agonist within last 3 month prior trial enrollment Cardiovascular disease within last 6 month Recurrent severe hypoglycaemia hypoglycaemic unawareness hospitalisation diabetic ketoacidosis previous 6 month Uncontrolled treated/untreated severe hypertension , impair liver function , impaired renal function , know proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require treatment Cancer medical history cancer past 5 year ( except basal cell skin cancer squamous cell skin cancer ) Pregnancy , breastfeeding , intention become pregnant use adequate contraceptive measure accord local requirement
